description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hp8k","text":"This protocol describes the application of BARseq-style in situ sequencing adapted for barcoded rabies virus. Similar procedures for both trans-synaptic tracing and retrograde tracing experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4gmcb","text":"Standard precautions with RNA samples should be taken to reduce RNA degradation during tissue processing and library preparation. Pipetting and suctioning should be gentle throughout the whole procedure, and sample should not be left dried.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: BARseq,in situ sequencing, spatial transcriptomics,barcoding-based neuroanatomy

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"atse0","text":"Tissues with barcoded neurons should be cryo-sectioned to 20 Î¼m and mounted on slides. Slides can be stored at -80 Â°C for up to a month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjttp","text":"DAY 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlmni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kcue","text":"Take slide(s) out of -80 Â°C and immerse immediately in 4% paraformaldehyde in 1x PBS (2 slides per 50mL falcon tube, back-to-back)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b3o39","text":"Incubate for 1 hour at room temperature on slow shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esm1j","text":"Wash the slides by immersing in 1x PBS (2 slides per 50ml falcon tube, back to back)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a09lo","text":"Wipe excess PBS off the surface of the chamber, then stick on the Hybriwell-FL chambers. Note that the ports on the chamber should be placed as far away from the tissue slices as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d1pld","text":"Wash twice in PBST (1x PBS + 0.5% Tween-20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68q44","text":"Wash in 70% Ethanol for 5 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3khtj","text":"Wash in 85% Ethanol for 5 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aun1o","text":"Wash in 100% Ethanol for 5 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jduq","text":"Replace with new 100% Ethanol, drop extra 100% Ethanol on top of slides and cover with ParaFilm to avoid evaporation. Incubate for at least 1.5 hrs at 4 Â°C (up to 3 hours)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d92l6","text":"Wash in PBST for 4-6 times, until all bubbles are cleared in the chamber and PBST flows in and out of the chamber smoothly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16k9q","text":"Make reverse transription mix:  50 Î¼M N20 primer (XC2757), 2 Î¼M XCAI6, 2 Î¼M XCAI7, 20 U/Î¼L RevertAid H Minus M-MuLV reverse transcriptase, 500 Î¼M dNTP, 0.2 Î¼g/Î¼L BSA, 1 U/Î¼L RiboLock RNase Inhibitor, 1x RevertAid RT buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkej4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejbqi","text":"For the monosynaptic tracing experiments, the RT primers additionally included 2 Î¼M of primers for the rabies glycoprotein (XCAI63 through XCAI76). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"i620","text":"Incubate in reverse transcription mix overnight at 37 Â°C. Create a humidity chamber to avoid the slides drying out using kim-wipes and DI water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18ebn","text":"DAY 2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpcmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbtpu","text":"Wash with PBST once","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jggd","text":"Incubate in a mixture of 1Î¼L BS(PEG)9 per 4 Î¼L PBST (e.g. 200ul BS(PEG)9 and 800ul PBST) for one hour at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l3br","text":"Wash with 1M Tris pH 8.0, then incubate in new 1M Tris pH 8.0 for 30 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a96fh","text":"Wash twice in PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2facf","text":"Make non-gap-filling ligation mix: 1x Ampligase buffer, 20 nM padlock probe each, 0.5 U/Î¼L Ampligase, 0.4 U/Î¼L RNase H, 1 U/Î¼L RiboLock RNase Inhibitor, 50 mM KCl (extra of those already provided by the ampligase buffer), 20% formamide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vsma","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qjui","text":"In the retrograde tracing experiments, the non-gap-filling padlock probe mix included all padlock probes for endogenous genes. In the monosynaptic tracing experiments, the non-gap-filling padlock probe mix included all padlock probes for endogenous genes except Slc30a3, and additionally included padlocks for the rabies glycoprotein (XCAI77 â XCAI90).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":262,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4odc2","text":"Incubate in ligation mix for at least 30 mins at 37 Â°C (can go longer but not shorter), then at least 45 mins at 45 Â°C (can go longer but not shorter).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"336ob","text":"Wash twice in PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c5nq","text":"Make RCA mix: 1 U/Î¼L phi29 DNA polymerase, 1x phi29 polymerase buffer, 0.25 mM dNTP, 0.2 Î¼g/Î¼L BSA, 5% glycerol (extra of those from the enzymes), 125 Î¼M aminoallyl dUTP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2boto","text":"Incubate in RCA mix overnight at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hr4k","text":"DAY 3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7il","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t63f","text":"Wash with PBST once","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
